@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff not about your gender, about the points on LGBT and the Muslim ban.
@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff queen of the trolls. I didn't exactly go stalk your profile or anything. I just disagree with you
@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff hahaha serious? hats off to you sir, King of the Trolls.
@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff It was a blanket ban on the country. All part of his anti-Islam ban
@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff This is why. https://t.co/huC4KQdQvB
@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff The order was specifically for Muslim majority countries. of course there will be other religions.
@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff I clearly don't condone any violence, and the person who did it should be arrested.
@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff he has flagged honour killings and the such but these things are already illegal & would be punished
@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff he's discriminated against a group based on faith (I believe you guys still have freedom of religion)
@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff I wouldn's call that a particularly reputable source there.
@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff Also there is nothing I can see that shows that the order in the #MuslimBan that is to protect #LGBT
@nfltexanchick @POTUS @RoguePOTUSStaff Protests don't show hate, it is standing up to an injustice.
@nfltexanchick @POTUS yes but is a rumour that appears to be meantioned by @RoguePOTUSStaff, so being ready for it is important.
6/ Again I reiterate that this is all speculative and just a rumour, but based on the past week I feel being prepared is important.
5/ I may not be from the #USA but I have many friends from different backgrounds there and I want them to be in a country free of tyranny.
4/ The clown in office (@realDonaldTrump) seems to think he is a dictator, and cannot be held accountable to the people. #ResistTrump
3/ If it is removing the rights of the #LGBT community I would encourage the people to take to the streets and #resist peacefully.
2/ If it is some kind of barbaric registry I would encourage all people to sign it to make it us ineffective as possible. #LGBT #Resist
1/ I’m hearing rumours about an #ExecutiveOrder from @POTUS regarding #LGBT issues including adoption. I want to know what is in it first.
@RoguePOTUSStaff If it's a registry I would want to see every1 sign it. If it's taking away rights I want to see feet on the streets #resist

@wilw I really hope for you sake this wasn't some kind of unfortunate login error.
@triplexscot @SenatorMRoberts certainly much easier to spell than #propaganda. #AlternativeFacts #PostTruthWorld
@SenatorMRoberts and I don't have to be in the same state to be embarrassed by the outlandish conspiracy theories you announce to the world.
@SenatorMRoberts I don't have to be in the same state to watch you lose your seat.
@SenatorMRoberts apparently to top off my complaints I can also describe you as both rude and arrogant. I look forward to the next election.
15/ @SenatorMRoberts we the people would appreciate it if you would step down from your role and allow someone more qualified to step up.
14/ People should have the right to protest #AustraliaDay considering all the damage that happened to the Aboriginal people and culture.
13/ How can an elected official of this country have such a lack of understanding about #Australia? We are a land of immigrants.
12/ Hell, he apparently does not even understand that the Labour Day public holiday is unrelated to @AustralianLabor.
11/ I worry @SenatorMRoberts will start attacking my #muslim friends for having a belief different to his own.
10/ But my concern is if he stops with his rubbish ramblings about science he will pick up in other political areas.
9/ Until that time his opinion should mean nothing in terms of fact, and facts are the only thing that matters when it comes to science.
8/ When @SenatorMRoberts publishes a research paper or report proving his claims and has it peer reviewed then he can be involved.
7/ The staff at @CSIROnews have studied #ClimateChange for years and then worked in the industry using this expertise.
6/ I would implore @SenatorMRoberts to leave the science to places like the @CSIROnews, these are #Australia’s experts.
5/ As a person who previously worked in coal he is clearly biased to help his mates in coal, and other parts of the fossil fuel industry.
4/ The senator has made it clear that he doesn’t understand the definition of the word empirical, which is critical when discussing science.
3/ In the same respect perhaps @SenatorMRoberts should step back and think about what he is an expert in. It is clear it isn’t science.
2/ When I'm sick I see a doctor, because they're an expert. Likewise when I want information on #ClimateScience I will consult an expert.
1/ I am sick and tired of fools being given the same consideration as experts in a field. None more so than @SenatorMRoberts. #auspol
@SenatorMRoberts Because fuck future generations? You sir are an embarrassment to #Australia. Please resign your post.
@SenatorMRoberts This is a joke I hope. Labour day as absolutely nothing to do with @AustralianLabor.
